item.title: Report X-2024120181
item.description:
Report X-2024120181

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-05T12:24:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-03
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Pkg missing required markings for shipment containing hazardous contents. 1 x 24 oz. bottle of Hand Sanitizer 70% has a Flash point of 25-27 C (77-80.6 F) and typically ships as "Ltd Qty". Loose and missing trigger spray heads of non-hazardous liquid contents allowed liquid to leak wetting and damaging the contents and carton. Excessive weight of the contents and weakening from the leaked liquid caused the corner of the carton to rip and glue to fail on the closure tape.
